item.description:
It was clear from our last meeting that many of our members are dealing with issues relating to the web and to marketing in the social network economy. 

If you have any questions about Social Networking, Twitter, Facebook and the fast moving trends in this area, be sure to attend our November 30th workshop with Heather Colby of Colby Strategic Marketing. 

Here are the details:

Join subject expert Heather Colby of Colby Strategic Marketing for a 2 hour Twitter Training/Workshop full of live demos and examples on how to use Twitter to market your business. The workshop will also include a segment on Strategic Marketing - are you being strategic or reactive?

The subjects of social economics and cyber marketing were a hit at our October meeting and many of you were interested in a follow-up workshop. We are fortunate that Heather Colby has made herself available to present this timely information to us.  If you need more information on this workshop email Heather at hcolby@colbystrategicmarketing.com. 

Heather's Bio: Heather A. Colby brings over 15 years of brand management, integrated marketing plan development and execution, business planning and event management to her clients. Her tenure at Fortune 500 companies and others include Applica Consumer Products and Black & Decker® branded Household Products, Hasbro, Inc., BIC Corporation and Edible Arrangements International. Heather has particular expertise in the area of Twitter and social economics. 

A light breakfast will be included in the registration fee.

 

Check-in and networking from 8:30 to 9:00.  The workshop begins promptly at 9:00.
item.name: Marketing Your Business in a Wired World
